title: Kobold demonologist
data:

|   | A kobold who is in league with demonic powers and can call forth beings from the depths of Hell.***“The Parts Septentrionall are with these Sp’ryts Much haunted.. About the places where they dig for Oare. The Greekes and Germans call them Cobali.” -Thomas Heywood, \_The Hierarchy of the Blessed Angels\_, Book IX, l. 568. 1635. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Kobold demonologists** are [kobolds](/Kobold_\(monster\) "Kobold (monster)") that have learned how to summon [lesser](/Lesser_demon "Lesser demon") and [common](/Common_demon "Common demon") [demons](/Demon "Demon"). Fortunately, they aren't much more durable than their non-magical brethren. They are uncommon, most commonly encountered late in [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Summon Minor Demon](/Summon_Minor_Demon "Summon Minor Demon") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon")                   | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Cantrip](/Cantrip "Cantrip")                                  | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- They are fairly fragile, so it's usually a better idea to kill the summoner rather than the summoned demons. Once the demonologist dies, its summons vanish with it.
- Summon Demon can create all kinds of dangerous enemies, such as [sixfirhies](/Sixfirhies "Sixfirhies") and [neqoxecs](/Neqoxec "Neqoxec"), so take them out quickly. Having a piercing, [smite-targeted](/Smite-targeted "Smite-targeted"), or AOE attack can be useful to attack through summons and other kobolds.

## History

- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), you could meet **an apprentice kobold demonologist** in [the Sewers](/The_Sewers "The Sewers"). This monster was only capable of summoning [lesser demons](/Lesser_demon "Lesser demon").
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), kobold demonologists were considerably more fragile.
html:
Kobold demonologist

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all kobolds, see list of kobolds.

kobold demonologist K 
HP 25-52
HD 6
XP 368
Speed 10
AC 4
EV 13
Will 40
Attack1 4 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type kobold, kobold
Flags
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A kobold who is in league with demonic powers and can call forth beings from the depths of Hell.

“The Parts Septentrionall are with these Sp’ryts Much haunted.. About the places where they dig for Oare. The Greekes and Germans call them Cobali.”
-Thomas Heywood, _The Hierarchy of the Blessed Angels_, Book IX, l. 568. 1635.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Kobold demonologists are kobolds that have learned how to summon lesser and common demons. Fortunately, they aren't much more durable than their non-magical brethren. They are uncommon, most commonly encountered late in the Dungeon.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Summon Minor Demon Wizard flag
Slot2 Summon Demon Wizard flag
Slot3 Cantrip Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • They are fairly fragile, so it's usually a better idea to kill the summoner rather than the summoned demons. Once the demonologist dies, its summons vanish with it.
  • Summon Demon can create all kinds of dangerous enemies, such as sixfirhies and neqoxecs, so take them out quickly. Having a piercing, smite-targeted, or AOE attack can be useful to attack through summons and other kobolds.

History

  • Prior to 0.19, you could meet an apprentice kobold demonologist in the Sewers. This monster was only capable of summoning lesser demons.
  • Prior to 0.14, kobold demonologists were considerably more fragile.
